name: Xadado
description:
CONTROLS

arrows -> move die

mouse -> select die

spacebar -> end turn

Game for 2. Select a die by clicking on it. End your turn by clicking the green play button or by pressing the spacebar.

To end your turn the current die must be out of moves.

You can only take an enemy die if you eat it as your die gets to 0 moves.

Made using TIC80

Chess dice inspired by the the mechanics in dicetance
